docs.snippet: A charitable foundation to be run by Los Angeles Clippers co-owner Shelly Sterling, whose estranged husband, Donald Sterling, is being forced to sell the NBA team after making racist remarks, will have a stake in the franchise, a source close to n...
docs.lead_paragraph: A charitable foundation to be run by Los Angeles Clippers co-owner Shelly Sterling, whose estranged husband, Donald Sterling, is being forced to sell the NBA team after making racist remarks, will have a stake in the franchise, a source close to negotiations said on Monday.

headline.main: Shelly Sterling to Start Charity With Stake in NBA's Clippers: Source
headline.print_headline: Shelly Sterling to Start Charity With Stake in NBA's Clippers: Source

docs.snippet: Mark Emmert, the president of the N.C.A.A., is an unapologetic target of detractors as his organization faces legal challenges to its amateurism model....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Emmert, the president of the N.C.A.A., is an unapologetic target of detractors as his organization faces legal challenges to its amateurism model.
docs.abstract: Dr Mark A Emmert, president of the NCAA, has become an unapologetic target of criticism as his organization faces host of legal challenges and accusations that it exploits young athletes; Emmert deeply opposes unionization push and other efforts to undermine the amateurism model that has long governed college sports.

headline.main: Face of the N.C.A.A., Battered Early and Often
headline.print_headline: Face of the N.C.A.A., Battered Early and Often

docs.snippet: For years, Fred Goldman was adamant that he would never rest until he had held O.J. Simpson accountable for the killings of his son Ron and Simpson's ex-wife 20 years ago — even if a jury had acquitted the former football star....
